name: Wrench to restore silence
description:
Hand-drawn action platformer. Don't you sometimes want to get away from noise and crowds and just watch night sky? So does this little wolf who took a wrench and build a spaceship which took him to a nice and quiet planet. But suddenly he sees other spaceships are landing on his little planet. Can't they just leave him alone?!

Created for Game Jam 2021 AD

Controllers:
- left/right to move;
- space to jump;
- enter to hit.

All art and code created by Anastasia Merzlaya during the game jam, audio taken from assets.
